channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's Board of Peace has several invited leaders trying to figure out how it'll work

item.title: Researchers find Antarctic penguin breeding is heating up sooner

item.title: Bessent Calls Powell’s Attendance at Supreme Court Arguments on Fed Independence a ‘Mistake’
item.description: The Treasury secretary’s criticism comes after he attended arguments over President Trump’s tariff authority last year.

item.title: In the World of Weight Loss, the Calorie No Longer Counts
item.description: Long held up as the big benchmark of nutrition, the calorie is losing its clout in the age of GLP-1s and a sharper focus on nutrients.

item.title: Now Boarding the Freedom Plane: Precious Founding-Era Documents

item.title: A.I., Big Tech and Trump Shine Most Brightly at the Davos Spectacle
item.description: The World Economic Forum is now dominated by global technology companies whose interests shunt aside most others.

item.title: How the Train Crash in Spain Unfolded
item.description: Two trains collided on Sunday in southern Spain, killing at least 40 people. Here is what happened.

item.title: Trump Heckles Europe Before Heading to Davos
item.description: As European leaders try to engage with the American president over Greenland and the future of Ukraine, he is mocking them as weak.
